title: Shawl (Perraje)
description: woven on a foot loom; stripes of solid colors in silk alternating with stripes with ikat motifs and letters (\"Serapia Quich Ortis\") in cotton; fine macrame work on both ends, from the warp ends, and bright balls of woolen yarn
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
